projects.name: PERSONAL PORTFOLIO
projects.description: Designed and developed a visually appealing personal portfolio web application. The project aimed to showcase skills, experience and projects effectively, providing a user-friendly and interactive experience.

projects.name: WHATSAPP CLONE
projects.description: Developed a feature-rich Chat Application utilizing MERN stack technologies, integrating real-time messaging via Socket.IO. Implemented one-to-one messaging and integrated Google authentication for enhanced user access.

projects.name: TYPING SPEED TEST
projects.description: Developed a web application to test users typing speed. The speed is calculated on the basis of words written per minute by the user.

projects.name: HOME DCOR CLONE
projects.description: Designed a Frontend Home Dcor web application. The project aimed to provide user with a platform to discover various innovative ideas to style their homes, offices and gardens.

experiences.description: Worked upon appypie design, which is a designing application similar to Canva using Fabric.Js. Adding features in appypie design software. Implemented AsPIs for updating the data whenever the user changes some information/design layout in firebase.
